text: Eike Christian Hirsch (6 April 1937 – 7 August 2022) was a Dutch-born German journalist and author. Hirsch was born in 1937 in Bilthoven, Netherlands and grew up in Göttingen. He was an editor in sound broadcasting at the NDR and was later a freelance journalist. In the 1980s, he was the host of the talk show 3 nach 9. Hirsch died on 7 August 2022 in Hannover, Germany at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German journalists Category:Writers from Utrecht (province)
title: Eike Christian Hirsch
